abstrac: Achieving Equilibrium by aligning People, Process and Technology with Core Purpose, Vision and Values
bio:
We formed EquiCore Consulting, to help organizations solve problems in a way that creates the best value for all; Customers, Employees, Owners, Investors, Vendors and Partners. 
We use a framework, that aligns business activities with the organization's Core Purpose, Vision and Values, which results in efficiency and effectiveness in the operations of the organization and among it's people.
Our Services include;
Business Model Development
Business Planning
Business Process Optimization
Product Management Consulting
Project Management Consulting
Risk Management Consulting
Workshop and Meeting Facilitation

bio: I have over 20 years experience in the accounting fields.  I have worked for an Ad Valorem tax service in Dallas, and had my own company for a number of years.  Our family-oriented company was service-based and after my husband's passing and the economy crunch in 2009, we had to shut down.  Since then I have wanted to work for myself again.  My capabilities are there, with an eagerness too achieve a successful business I can run from home.

I will work from home so I will have plenty of time to make sure all aspects and details are taken care of for you.    Payment terms would be by the week, bi-weekly I prefer to be paid at the latest, every two weeks.  You will see how I can handle finances for you, and expect payment as we go along.  If bookkeeping services are needed ongoing, I would expect payment every two weeks, also.   I am available now, as soon as you require my assistance.  I am here to help you, that is my purpose on this sight.

abstrac: Front End Developer | PSD to Wordpress , HTML , CSS Javascript
bio:
I am a passionate Front End Developer seeking for clients here on Guru. My goal is to impress every client to have a long term business relationship with them. So when i accept or apply for a project, I give my full attention and dedication. I don't do a crap job and jump to another pile of works. I understand that I am here to help clients and not to give them another headache.

What i do:
- WordPress Theming and Installation
- Wordpress Plugin installation
- Multilingual Wordpress Sites
-       Conversion of HTML and Joomla sites to Wordpress
- Conversion of PSD Designs to pixel perfect pages using HTML/CSS/Javascript
- Wordpress Site Migration to another hosting
- Content Migration
- Cross-browser checking (Chrome, Firefox, IE(7+), Safari, Opera)
- Cross-platform Mobile Development (mobiles, tablets)
- Modification and maintenance of website's user interfaces
- Run backup and update WP and plugins
- Facebook page app development
- MailChimp setup
- Creating 301, 302 and 401 Redirects
- Cpanel Server Administration
-  Data entry
-  Photo Retouching using Adobe Photoshop
I can work anytime of the day as what is needed. I can do 40 hours a week work since i don't have a full time contract yet. I prefer a twice a month payment via Paypal.

abstrac: Seasoned developer with more than a decade of experience in .NET, software engineering and project management experience.
bio:
* Microsoft certified professional with 12+ years of exceptional professional expertise in design, development and implementation of web-based, client-server and console applications.
* Web application development expertise in Microsoft.NET and classic Microsoft technology.
* Solid Experience in client server and multi-tier architecture projects using Microsoft.NET, VB.NET, ASP.NET, VB, ASP, XML, COM and SQL Server.
* Excellent understanding of object-oriented design and development
* Expert with SQL Server in writing stored procedures, functions, triggers, views and enforcing data-integrity rules, performance tuning and server management.
* Expertise in classic Microsoft technologies like ASP,VB, VBScript, JavaScript, HTML and DHTML
* Expert in project development life cycle, systems analysis, application development and application maintenance in web-based and client-server environments. 
* Solid experience working with entity framework, WCF services and architecture, SOA, SQL SERVER

General Availability:
Available via email daily. Preferred method of communication is email/skype 

Payment Method:
Transaction through SafePay Escrow. Will only work with employers who
agree to the Escrow service.
